casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Frank BOWEN. No. 342P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant District Attorney, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of November 2005 by Defendant for Appeal of Right Under G.S. 7A-30(1)-Constitutional Questions and G.S. 7A-31-Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
